title: Top Things You Didn’t Know You Could Do With Netlify CLI￼
content:
(This is a sponsored post.)

First things first, if you didn’t know Netlify had a CLI, they do.  One of my favorite things about it running the command netlify dev on nearly any static-site generator project is seeing it …

Top Things You Didn’t Know You Could Do With Netlify CLI￼ originally published on CSS-Tricks. You should get the newsletter.
